text: 🤔 Ontarios Health Ministerin @SylviaJones annoucned an expansion of private clinics for medical imaging & cataract surgeries, now including hip and knee replacements 🤑 The province aims to comply with the Canada Health Act avoiding patients paying for medically necessary procedures 💰 The 20 billion Canadian dollars from the federal government this year for health care are at stake 🤝 Private clinics will be operated, but procedures will be covered under the provincial health care plan like in public hospitals 🤔 What do you think about the growing private-sector involvement in Canadian public health care systems? 💬 Share your thoughts!
